siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Planning to take time off this holiday season? The automatic out-of-office calendar from Clockwise makes it effortless to coordinate with your team. Simply mark your calendar OOO and Clockwise will sync your availability to the shared team calendar.
blogPost.body: Planning to take time off this holiday season? The automatic out-of-office calendar from Clockwise makes it effortless to coordinate with your team. Simply mark your calendar OOO and Clockwise will sync your availability to the shared team calendar.
blogPost.title: Automatic out-of-office calendar - Just mark your calendar as OOO, we take care of the rest
blogPost.author: John Lilly

localize.description: 这个假期你打算请假吗？来自顺时针的自动外出日历使您可以毫不费力地与您的团队进行协调。只需将您的日历标记为OOO，顺时针就会将您的可用性同步到共享的团队日历。
localize.tagline: 只需将您的日历标记为OOO，我们会处理睡觉

localize.description: 這個假期你打算請假嗎？來自順時針的自動外出日曆使您可以毫不費力地與您的團隊進行協調。只需將您的日曆標記爲OOO，順時針就會將您的可用性同步到共享的團隊日曆。
localize.tagline: 只需將您的日曆標記爲OOO，我們會處理睡覺

previous.excerpt: Axel is a virtual assistant who helps you develop a culture of transparency and ownership in your team. You set up the right 1:1 and weekly check-in from templates in a few clicks. Our secret sauce: no need to add another tool, everything is done in Slack.
previous.title: Axel - Powerful rituals to drive your team to success.

localize.description: Axel是一个虚拟助手，帮助您在团队中培养透明和主人翁的文化。只需单击几下，即可从模板设置正确的1：1和每周签到。我们的秘诀：不需要添加其他工具，一切都在Slake中完成。
localize.tagline: 推动您的团队走向成功的强大仪式。

localize.description: Axel是一個虛擬助手，幫助您在團隊中培養透明和主人翁的文化。只需單擊幾下，即可從模板設置正確的1：1和每週簽到。我們的祕訣：不需要添加其他工具，一切都在Slake中完成。
localize.tagline: 推動您的團隊走向成功的強大儀式。

next.excerpt: A lot happened in 2020. Despite everything, developers coded, learned new stuff, deployed and debugged. Here are a few highlights from a year to remember (or, you know, forget).
next.title: 2020 Year in Review by CodersRank - How did you code in 2020?

localize.description: 2020年发生了很多事情。尽管如此，开发人员还是编码、学习新知识、部署和调试。以下是一年中值得记住(或者，你知道，忘记)的一些亮点。
2020年發生了很多事情。儘管如此，開發人員還是編碼、學習新知識、部署和調試。以下是一年中值得記住(或者，你知道，忘記)的一些亮點。
